医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新冠病毒长期暴露：患者面临着不同的身体、心理和社会挑战2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 或长期 COVID 的急性后遗症患者经历。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Long-COVID-unmasked-Patients-share-varied-physical-mental-and-social-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Long-COVID-unmasked-Patients-share-varied-physical-mental-and-social-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5b459d2-3ad1-4898-a6ac-6b128929edd6 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 08:08:00 -0400 Long COVID unmasked: Patients share varied physical, mental, and social challenges
预测跨多个祖先的多基因遗传的更好方法研究人员报告了在跨国 GWAS 数据库上使用名为 CT-SLEB 的新型 PRS 计算器获得的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/A-better-method-to-predict-polygenic-inheritance-across-multiple-ancestries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/A-better-method-to-predict-polygenic-inheritance-across-multiple-ancestries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04c10831-7448-4323-94e7-01d653100797 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 07:53:00 -0400 A better method to predict polygenic inheritance across multiple ancestries
产后饮食干预对肥胖女性体重管理的益处研究人员探讨了饮食干预对体重指数较高的产后女性的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Benefits-of-postpartum-dietary-intervention-on-weight-management-in-obese-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Benefits-of-postpartum-dietary-intervention-on-weight-management-in-obese-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72bc13e9-16fe-4441-99d8-39c18b064063 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 07:46:00 -0400 Benefits of postpartum dietary intervention on weight management in obese women
Applied Cells 设立 CellQuest 研究基金以加速多发性骨髓瘤前沿研究Applied Cells 很高兴地宣布 CellQuestGrant 启动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Applied-Cells-opens-CellQuest-Research-Grant-to-accelerate-cutting-edge-multiple-myeloma-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Applied-Cells-opens-CellQuest-Research-Grant-to-accelerate-cutting-edge-multiple-myeloma-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1db8ac93-515c-46d9-a208-9676619f8dea Mon, 02 Oct 2023 07:21:00 -0400 Applied Cells opens CellQuest Research Grant to accelerate cutting-edge multiple myeloma research
Mogrify 将 A 轮融资扩大至 4600 万美元Mogrify Limited (Mogrify®) 是一家通过新型体内重编程疗法改变患者生活的生物制药公司，今天宣布完成 A 轮融资额外 1000 万美元的融资。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Mogrify-extends-Series-A-financing-to-2446-million-USD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Mogrify-extends-Series-A-financing-to-2446-million-USD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1042d19d-c718-43c1-800a-5bb70ed569ce Mon, 02 Oct 2023 06:56:00 -0400 Mogrify extends Series A financing to $46 million USD
利用 INTEGRA Biosciences 的电子移液器为线粒体疾病带来希望INTEGRA Biosciences 的 VOYAGER 可调节吸头间距移液器支持他们对线粒体疾病的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Unlocking-hope-for-mitochondrial-disorders-with-INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-electric-pipette.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Unlocking-hope-for-mitochondrial-disorders-with-INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-electric-pipette.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcb6f8c1-0722-40c5-9153-734ff99bd6a3 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 06:55:00 -0400 Unlocking hope for mitochondrial disorders with INTEGRA Biosciences’ electronic pipette
总部位于柏林的实验室仪器公司 Knauer 致力于可持续发展在纽约举行联合国可持续发展峰会的同时，实验室测量仪器制造商 KNAUER 于 2023 年 9 月 18 日启动了今年的可持续发展周。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Berlin-Based-Lab-Instruments-Company-Knauer-Tackles-Sustainability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Berlin-Based-Lab-Instruments-Company-Knauer-Tackles-Sustainability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c36e8be-5843-496c-ba9f-7ced6387b932 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 06:50:00 -0400 Berlin-Based Lab Instruments Company Knauer Tackles Sustainability
Evonetix 推出新品牌，以符合其基因长度 DNA 合成的愿景EVONETIX LTD（“Evonetix”）今天宣布推出新品牌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Evonetix-unveils-new-branding-to-align-with-its-vision-for-gene-length-DNA-synthesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Evonetix-unveils-new-branding-to-align-with-its-vision-for-gene-length-DNA-synthesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7087709-d38d-499b-b0d0-7821b4b71e48 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 06:49:00 -0400 Evonetix unveils new branding to align with its vision for gene-length DNA synthesis
Start Codon 邀请生命科学领导者、创始人和投资者参加 2023 年创新展示会Start Codon 很高兴邀请来自生命科学和生物技术行业的生命科学人士参加他们的 2023 年创新展示会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Start-Codon-invites-life-sciences-leaders-Founders-and-investors-to-Innovation-Showcase-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Start-Codon-invites-life-sciences-leaders-Founders-and-investors-to-Innovation-Showcase-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07a779a4-935e-4c66-b2aa-7dddffbf741c Mon, 02 Oct 2023 06:44:00 -0400 Start Codon invites life sciences leaders, founders, and investors to Innovation Showcase 2023
Broken String Biosciences 加强高级领导团队以加速产品开发和商业化Broken String Biosciences 是一家基因组学公司，致力于构建一个技术平台来推动设计更安全的细胞和基因疗法的开发，该公司今天宣布扩大其高级领导团队。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Broken-String-Biosciences-strengthens-senior-leadership-team-to-accelerate-product-development-and-commercialization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Broken-String-Biosciences-strengthens-senior-leadership-team-to-accelerate-product-development-and-commercialization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f35ac21-3f3b-40c2-a20e-5a45a553b2f1 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 06:38:00 -0400 Broken String Biosciences strengthens senior leadership team to accelerate product development and commercialization
